description: Discover the best hotels in Chicago, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Historic French-Inspired Luxury in the Heart of Chicago with Day Spa & Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the allure of the Windy City with a stay at a luxurious hotel, majestically towering over the heart of Chicago's Magnificent Mile. Surrounded by the city's finest dining, shopping, and cultural attractions, this architectural marvel offers the perfect base for exploring the city's vibrant scene. Just moments away, you'll find the Art Institute of Chicago, the Navy Pier, and the iconic Millennium Park. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's chic lounge for a craft cocktail or savour French-inspired dishes at the onsite CDA Restaurant.

hotels.vendor_name: The Royal Sonesta Chicago River North
hotels.title: Downtown Chicago Central Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool & Outdoor Sundeck
hotels.description: Stay moments away from Chicago's must-visit sights when you stay at the stylish Royal Sonesta Chicago River North. With a convenient location in the heart of the action, stay within walking distance to the likes of Michigan Avenue, Navy Pier and Millennium Park. When you're not exploring the area, escape to the hotel's 17th-floor indoor heated swimming pool and spacious outdoor sundeck, an oasis in the heart of the city. If you're looking to stretch and sweat, the sleek centre features Peloton Bikes and a stellar view over the city. Feeling hungry? Head to C.B.R, the hotel's dining venue where creative menus, extensive whisky varieties and craft cocktails are in abundance.

hotels.title: Luxe Chicago Heritage Escape within Downtown Chicago's Loop
hotels.description: Steep yourself in Chicago history with a stay at the illustrious Pendry Chicago, housed within the 1929 Carbide & Carbon Building in downtown Chicago’s Loop neighbourhood. Art Deco history blends with modern luxury to create a launchpad for the city's famous attractions. Venture out of the lavish hotel to be met with an array of world-class restaurants and cocktail bars, along with historic architecture, an exemplary theatre district and quintessential art museums.

hotels.title: Stylish Downtown Chicago Escape near Millennium Park with Restaurant & Pool
hotels.description: Begin your Windy City adventure with a sophisticated stay at the voco Chicago Downtown, an IHG Hotel. Set in the River North district, this contemporary retreat is steps from the Magnificent Mile's high-end boutiques and the city's celebrated culinary scene. Enjoy a crafted cocktail and savour delicious American fare at Waterview on the 15th floor, grab a quick bite to eat from Riverbend Market, or take a relaxing dip in the heated pool.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Chicago All-Suite Retreat near Magnificent Mile with Signature Restaurant
hotels.description: Savour the epitome of Chicago's urban elegance at this chic city haven, perfectly situated mere steps from the iconic Magnificent Mile, home to world-class shopping, dining and nightlife. From vibrant cultural landmarks to Michelin-starred dining, explore it all within a short stroll of this impressive city address. Embark on urban adventures with guided pizza tours and the Chicago mobster tour and experience the Windy City to the fullest. After a day of exploration, return to your well-appointed suite, embracing historical elements from the works of renowned Chicago architect Louis Sullivan. When hunger strikes, make your way to the fourth-floor 676 Restaurant & Bar, boasting chef-curated specialities and inspired cocktails.

hotels.title: Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Chicago's Gold Coast
hotels.description: Discover a slice of serenity in one of Chicago’s most happening neighbourhoods at Claridge House, a boutique hotel that will become your home away from home. The calm oasis is a rare find, offering peace and quiet while remaining in the thick of the Gold Coast action, with some of the city’s best restaurants, attractions and landmarks right outside the hotel’s doors. Spend your days wandering the Magnificent Mile, shopping until you drop in Oak Street’s luxury boutiques, or admiring the amazing architecture at Millennium Park. Minimalist styling meets maximum comfort in Claridge House’s rooms and suites, with modern touches for a stress-free stay. Dial-up the relaxation at the onsite spa, indulging in a massage or facial, or get lost in conversation and conviviality at Juniper Restaurant, where handcrafted martinis flow freely.

hotels.vendor_name: The Allegro Royal Sonesta Hotel Chicago Loop
hotels.title: Downtown Chicago City Break with Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Old-school glamour meets modern sophistication at The Allegro Royal Sonesta Hotel, a gem in the heart of Chicago's cool downtown area, moments from the city's most notable attractions. Thanks to the hotel's convenient location, the sights of Chicago are right on your doorstep, with the River Walk, the Goodman Theatre, Millennium Park and Cloud Gate all within a 15-minute walk. Between exploring the city's sights, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, where a selection of Peloton Bikes is guaranteed to elevate your workout, while evenings are for unwinding with a cocktail or two at the hotel's sultry Bar Allegro, or for a long, leisurely Italian-inspired dinner at theatre-district favourite, 312 Chicago.

hotels.title: Bustling Chicago Loop District Hotel with Rooftop Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Kimpton Gray Hotel, an IHG Hotel epitomises timeless luxury in the heart of Chicago. Each meticulously designed room and suite offers a sanctuary of sophistication, with Nespresso coffee machines, deep soaking tubs and accessible-friendly amenities available in select rooms. Enjoy a cocktail at one of the hotel's bespoke bars, before indulging in an upscale dining experience at The Fillmore restaurant, where culinary artistry and impeccable service combine.

hotels.title: Stylish Riverfront Chicago Escape in the Heart of Downtown
hotels.description: Where the storied Chicago River meets the magnificent Michigan Avenue lies the Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown, the perfect launchpad for any traveller looking to experience the best of everything the Windy City offers. Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown’s reimagined and restored interiors warmly invigorate the hotel’s original historic building, and the expansive rooms and suites and Chicago Riverwalk location make it an unbeatable spot for friends, families and couples seeking the perfect urban escape. Enjoy a menu brimming with delicious classics at Hoyt’s American Tavern, take advantage of the hotel’s cutting-edge fitness facilities or simply step outside and feel the cool river breeze. You’ll be only a short stroll away from many of Chicago’s must-see destinations, including the Magnificent Mile, Lincoln Park and the Loop.
